verses.verse: What was from the beginning, what we have heard, what we have seen with our eyes, what we viewed and our hands felt concerning the message of the life

(actually, the life was shown, we have seen it, we are telling what we witnessed, and we are reporting to you about the life, the life that spans all time, something that was close to the Father and was shown to us),

what we have seen and heard, we are reporting to you so that you also may have a sharing relationship with us, even the sharing relationship (our sharing relationship) with the Father and with His Son Jesus, the Anointed King.
And we are writing these things to you so that your happiness may be happiness that has been filled up.
And this is the announcement that we have heard out from Him and are announcing to you: "God is light, and darkness is not in Him, not even one bit."
If we say that we have a sharing relationship with Him and we traipse around in the darkness, we lie and do not do the truth.
But if we traipse around in the light as He is in the light, we have a sharing relationship with each other, and the blood of Jesus, the Anointed King, His Son, cleans us off from every sin.
If we say that we don't have sin, we mislead ourselves and the truth is not in us.
If we acknowledge our sins, He is trustable and does what is right so that He might forgive us of the sins and clean us off from every wrong.
If we say that we haven't sinned, we make Him a liar and His message is not in us.
